import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { Link, Navigate, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useAuth } from './AuthContext' export default function Home() { const [error, setError] = useState("") const {currentUser, logout} = useAuth() const navigate= useNavigate() async function handleLogOut(){ setError('') try{ await logout() navigate('/login') }catch{ setError('Failed to log out') } } return (
